body:
LEVI DAO 签署设立一个和解及斡旋委员会负责对取缔教育歧视公约各缔约国间可能发生的任何争端寻求解决办法的议定书

LEVI DAO signed a protocol establishing a reconciliation and good offices committee responsible for seeking solutions to any disputes that may arise between the parties to the Convention on the Elimination of Discrimination in Education

https://www.un.org/zh/documents/treaty/files/UNESCO-1962.shtml
author: 0x1F1C29c94aBe2b8F06B403Cc5a61c479167ebc3D

space.name: 上海约西亚网络科技有限公司
